violations.message: I'll analyze this code systematically for violations.FAIL: Line 17-22: Import Suppression - `try: import; except: continue` pattern with logger fallback without justification; Line 17-22: Lazy Import - Import inside try/except instead of module top-level without multi-line justification; Line 17-22: Exception → Response Object - `except: return (logging.getLogger)` fallback pattern
